GSD.description:
ASoC: SOF: mediatek: initialize panic_info to zero

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.19 by commit eb4909c0a0d490d9cec82bb32b1e237397c4d6a2. For more details please see the references link.
